It all depends on what else you are drinking to stay hydrated & how much caffeine you take in. If you are drinking only soda, or also have a cup or two of coffee in the morning, that's not a good thing for three reasons. Firstly, the high caffeine intake isn't very good for baby and secondly, it is much easier to become dehydrated because you have to drink so much more water to compensate for the caffeine, sugar & chemicals. Lastly, soda is very high in sugar & has zero nutritional value. Its all empty calories & simple sugars that can contribute to gestational diabetes. The best rule of thumb is everything in moderation.
